AcademicTermEnrollment.name: AcademicTermEnrollment
AcademicTermEnrollment.description: Represents information about a student's enrollment in an Academic Term.

AcademicStanding.description: The learner's performance and progress for the term.

AcademicTermId.description: The Academic Term associated with the Academic Term Enrollment.

AcademicTermRegstrnTimelineId.description: The Academic Term Registration Timeline associated with the Academic Term Enrollment.

CumulativeGradePointAverage.description: The learner's cumulative grade point average, that is the average of all grade points achieved.

EnrollmentDate.description: The date that the student enrolled in the Academic Term.

EnrollmentReason.description: The reason the student enrolled in the Academic Term.

EnrollmentStatus.description: Specifies the status of a student's enrollment in the Academic Term.

ExitDate.description: The date when the student left the institution.

ExitReason.description: The reason that the student left the institution.

HoursAttempted.description: The number of credit hours or contact hours attempted by a student during the Academic Term.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearnerAccountId.description: The Account of the person associated with the Academic Term Enrollment.

LearnerContactId.description: The Contact person associated with the Academic Term Enrollment.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OpportunityId.description: The Opportunity associated with the Academic Term Enrollment.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

StudentAcademicLevel.description: Specifies the student's applicable point in the education process.

StudyYearClassification.description: Specifies the student's year of study classification.

TermGradePointAverage.description: The learner's grade point average for the Academic Term.
